topic.title: How to update existing ZeroTalk clone?
topic.body: Does someone know an easy way to update an existing ZeroTalk clone to the latest version of ZeroTalk, without losing all the topics?

topic.title: Free .bit Domains for ZeroNet Sites
topic.body:
I'm handing out free .bit domains for ZeroNet sites. 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/blog.0list.bit/?Post:2:Free+.bit+Domains+for+ZeroNet+Sites 
ツ

3_168qV1Xxp2EyszrzdECLUwXrn9wGYjDdar.body:
> [aimganesh0](#comment_1_19A6hpNLaSguuDxa1tCXBBD2wB3oKtwhvu): [...]
> I have started a website to discuss more....(still in development) try it.....http://127.0.0.1:43110/1EfBtV7woxqR5mL7r3PyDzD3AUDYcKLaxh

Cool site. I have added it to my list: 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/0List.bit

1_1M5ztUWkCMP5Pv7MjwApWT7CNvWimGFaFa.body:
> [nofish](#comment_232_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Backup your site's directory, Overwrite everything except content.json and data directory with the new files from the data/1TaLkFrMwvbNsooF4ioKAY9EuxTBTjipT directory. (same works for blogs)

Thanks!

1_1NxaomNYTzsRc8GwVWtd9wBMrP2fZPN3D6.body:
> [zalex](#comment_24_1LWuc6JBhUGrKEAh1aPrPU85dEMcKmg3pS): Dude, I sympathize, but... What do you want to achieve by writing this here?

Letting it out, that's what he wants to achieve. For all I care, he's more than welcome to do so. ツ

2_1M5ztUWkCMP5Pv7MjwApWT7CNvWimGFaFa.body:
> [kasthuri](#comment_1_1BBKD8mSqtGDaK5GQ5Q6A6mLhpc8xrgW97): hihow can i see the websites through zeronet

Hi  

What do you mean? You just have to add 127.0.0.1:43110 in front of the domain, for example: 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/blog.0list.bit/, and then open it in your web browser. You have to have ZeroNet installed of course.

2_1CMYxdit4qq9QGk9DYRu2ruRPd2YDGckH8.body:
Maybe this works: 1. Put the new avatar image in your site's "img" folder 2. Open the file "index.html" in a text editor 3. Search for the string
4. Replace it with 5. Save the changes
